message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, but $150 is a bit too high for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $85 right now.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $130.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $130 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to go up to $95.  What do you think?
I'm not willing to go as low as $95, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering the product to you for $125.
